article_title: Editorial: Should North Carolina expand Medicaid?
article_text:
Editorial: Should North Carolina expand Medicaid?

Nearly 17 million more people have gained health insurance since the Affordable Care Act went into effect, the Chicago Tribune reported recently.

Posted May 21, 2015 at 12:01 AM

Updated May 21, 2015 at 6:47 PM
